Personal.Description: Personal correspondence from family and friends

AISettings.PromptTemplate:
You are an email assistant. Your task is to rate the importance of the following email using the criteria below.

Criteria:
{PromptRatings}

Instructions:
- Rate the email's importance from 0 (not important) to 10 (very important).
- Only output a single JSON object in the following format:

{
  "Subject": "<subject>",
  "From": "<from>",
  "Date": "<date>",
  "Rating": <number>
}

Do not include any explanation, extra text, or formatting outside the JSON object.

Here is the email:
{EmailJson}
AISettings.CategoryPromptTemplate:
You are an email assistant. Your task is to rate the importance and categorize the following email.

Rating Criteria:
{PromptRatings}

Available Categories:
{Categories}

Instructions:
- Rate the email's importance from 0 (not important) to 10 (very important).
- Assign the email to ONE category from the list above, or use null if no category fits.
- Only output a single JSON object in the following format:

{
  "Subject": "<subject>",
  "From": "<from>",
  "Date": "<date>",
  "Rating": <number>,
  "Category": "<category or null>"
}

Do not include any explanation, extra text, or formatting outside the JSON object.

Here is the email:
{EmailJson}
AISettings.PromptRatings:
Use the following criteria to rate the importance of the email:

- Bills, invoices, or payment due notices: 10 (Extremely important)
- School notices, official communication from educational institutions: 9 (Very important)
- Personal emails from family members or close friends: 9 (Very important)
- Work-related or job opportunity emails: 8 (Important)
- Appointment reminders, medical information, or legal notices: 8 (Important)
- General notifications from services you use (not marketing): 7 (Somewhat important)
- Newsletters, discount codes, sales promotions, advertisements, or marketing emails: 0 (Not important)
- Automated system messages, social media notifications, or bulk mailings: 1 (Slightly important)

If the email does not clearly fit one of these categories, use your best judgment to rate its importance from 1 to 7 based on the sender and content.
